name: Any Means Necessary
description:
Work together to make it to the exit in ten difficult puzzles, but only one person needs to survive.

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left-click for action
  • R to restart a level

Characters:

  • Knight (Shield)
    • Pushes units in front of it up and away, his heavy shield will block projectiles and push objects.
  • Archer (Bow)
    • Shoots arrow that sticks allies into walls, turning them into platforms.
  • Wizard (Staff)
    • Fires a blast of ice, freezing allies.

Projectiles can pass through the pink barriers and push objects. The doors will turn green when they're open.
